name: The Royal Connector
description:
The Kingdom of Euphoria needs you!

 Play as the Royal Connector in service of the king and bring order to the lands. Your task is to reduce chaos by connecting nodes on the Royal Tablet, a magic device that transforms world conflict to a board game.

There are a total of 10 levels, ranging from beginner to challenging. In addition there is an infinite Arcade mode where you can play randomly generated levels. Playtime can range from half hour to an hour.

This game is made for Lost Relic Jam 2022 June in a few days.

Use binary version of game for savegames!

Controls
  • [Enter]: Pause menu
  • [X]: Grab nodes / Spawn ball / Play level
  • [Arrows]: Move grab hand / Select level

Controllers/Joysticks supported!
